  • Method Details

    • getUserID

      public static int getUserID(String username)
      Helper function that takes a string for username and returns the user_id value from the database
      Parameters:
      username - This is like a user's name
      Returns:
      int This will be the User ID

    • checkPassword

      public static boolean checkPassword(int user_id, String pword)
      Takes an integer corresponding to a user ID and checks if it matches with the password on file in the database.
      Parameters:
      user_id - User ID
      pword - the Password
      Returns:
      True if password is correct/matches, else return False

    • appointmentSoon

      public static Appointment appointmentSoon()
      Uses some time logic to see if there is an appointment beginning within 15 minutes of a successful log in. Returns the relevant Appointment object if a match. If no match, returns null.
      Returns:
      Appointment object occuring withing 15 minutes of login (or null if none)

    • deleteCustomer

      public static void deleteCustomer(int customerID)
      Deletes a customer from the database based on the ID of that customer.
      Parameters:
      customerID - Integer ID of customer

    • updateCustomer

      public static void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Takes a customer object created in client code, based on an existing customer record. Updates fields based on the data members of the object, matches to an existing customer ID in the customers database.
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object containing updated data to be written

    • addCustomer

      public static void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the database. Customer ID is auto-generated by the Java SQL API
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object containing data to be added

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Updates an existing entry in the appointment database based on the appointment ID of the appoinment (must be already existing)
      Parameters:
      appointment - Apointment object carrying data to be updated

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Adds a new appointment to the appointments table of the database, based on the data in an Appointment object
      Parameters:
      appointment - Appointment to add to database

    • getCountries

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getCountries()
      Used to return the list of countries from the country table to populate a combo box
      Returns:
      ResultSet The set of countries

    • getFLD

      public static ResultSet getFLD(String countryName)
      This method is used to populate combo box for first level divisions
      Parameters:
      countryName - Name from Database of a country
      Returns:
      ResultSet Set of all first level division areas in that country

    • deleteAppointments

      public static void deleteAppointments(int customerID)
      Deletes all appointments connected to a customer ID
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of a Customer about to be deleted

    • deleteSingleAppointment

      public static void deleteSingleAppointment(int appointmentID)
      Deletes a single appointment based on the appointment ID field
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to be deleted

    • getCountry

      public static String getCountry(int countryID)
      Returns a String for the country name fetched from Countries table
      Parameters:
      countryID - foreign key
      Returns:
      name of country

    • getCountryID

      public static int getCountryID(String country)
      Returns country ID values that corresponds to string value in country database
      Parameters:
      country - name of country
      Returns:
      country ID value from database

    • getCountry

      public static String getCountry(String fld)
      Retuns the name of a country from the countries database, based on the first-level division ID that corresponds to the foreign key
      Parameters:
      fld - first-level division that corresponds to a country
      Returns:
      String of the country name

    • getCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getCustomers()
      Populates and returns a reference to an Observable List object for the purposes of populating cells in a Table. Also pulls foreign key data from associated database tables
      Returns:
      ObservableList containing all customer data

    • getCustomersByCountryID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getCustomersByCountryID(int countryID)
      Creates an Observalbe List of customers sorted out by their country
      Parameters:
      countryID - corresponds to country ID in Database
      Returns:
      ObservableList of customers that meet criteria

    • getAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointments()
      Populates and returns an ObservableList full of all appointments in the appointment data as well as data from other tables associated with the foreign keys
      Returns:
      ObservableList with all appointments

    • getWeekAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getWeekAppointments()
      Queries database to return all appointments occurring within 7 days of the time of the query. Used to populate MainTable after radio button for week is pressed
      Returns:
      ObservableList Appointment

    • getMonthAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getMonthAppointments()
      Queries database to return an ObservableList of all the appointments in the current month
      Returns:
      ObservableList Appointment

    • getContacts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getContacts()
      Returns an Observable list containing all Contact names from the contacts database. Used to populate a ComboBox in the UI
      Returns:
      ObservableList of all contact names

    • checkForMeetings

      public static boolean checkForMeetings(int appointmentID, Timestamp startTime, Timestamp endTime)
      Takes a SQL Timestamp (must convert to UTC first for compatibility) to check if the meeting conflicts with any other scheduled meeting. Returns true for a conflict, false for not conflict.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID -
      startTime - UTC equivalent start time
      endTime - UTC equivalent end time
      Returns:
      true if there is a conflict, false if no conflicts

    • getTypes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getTypes()
      Queries appointemnts table and gets unique types, returns as ObservableList
      Returns:
      ObservableList String allTypes

    • getMonthNames

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getMonthNames()
      Query the Start times of the appointment database and return an ObservableList of distinct month names to populate a combobox in the reports
      Returns:
      ObservableList Months

    • getAppointmentsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByContact(String contact)
      Pass in the name of a contact to return a list of all appointments for that contact. Used to create a schedule for each contact in the comapny
      Parameters:
      contact - name of company contact
      Returns:
      ObservableList of appointments

    • getTypeCount

      public static int getTypeCount(String type, int month)
      Takes appointment "type" and a given month and returns the count of appointments that meet those two criteria
      Parameters:
      type - Appointment's "type" field
      month - calendar month of year
      Returns:
      total count of type in that month
